attributes.action: Demand for Arrest or Expel of Altaf Hussain from UK for threatening to slay and murder peaceful Pakistani protesters on May 12, 2013 in Karachi
attributes.additional_details:
The millions of Pakistanis across the globe demand that the England to stop providing a safe heaven to Altaf Hussain, the founder of Mutahidda Qaumi Movement in Pakistan.
Altaf Hussain is involved in acts of terrorism in Karachi, Pakistan and managing the extremist Political Party MQM remotely from the UK, causing a complete unrest of the area.

His latest act of threatening to slay and murder peaceful Pakistani protesters on May 12, 2013 in Karachi Teen Talwar Chowk area on national television is deplorable and is against fundamental human rights of freedom of speech.

We ask the British Government to arrest or expel this terrorist from the UK as we expect the English government to uphold fundamental human rights and not provide a safe heaven to a criminal.
